articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Google bans AI chatbot Gemini from answering election questions: 'Try Google Search' - New York Post
articles.description: Aside from the United States, national elections are set to be held in several large countries including South Africa and India, the world’s largest democracy.
articles.content: Google is restricting AI chatbot Gemini from answering questions about the global elections set to happen this year, the Alphabet-owned firm said Tuesday, as it looks to avoid potential missteps in t… [+1977 chars]
